display-name.lang: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

programme.title: Aaja Nachle
programme.desc: Dia returns home to find her beloved dance theatre facing demolition. Determined to save it, she inspires the indifferent townspeople to join a dance performance and fight for its survival.

programme.title: Aksar
programme.desc: Rajveer cannot divorce his possessive wife Sheena due to an expensive pre-nuptial agreement. However, when he hires Ricky to seduce and get rid of her, his plan backfires with serious consequences.

programme.title: Lajja
programme.desc: Four women from different walks of life, all victims of male chauvinism, are brought together due to common circumstances.

programme.title: Chalo Jeete Hai
programme.desc: Naru, a young boy, reads an inspirational quote which influences him deeply. He embarks on a quest to find the purpose of his life.

programme.title: Faasle
programme.desc: Chandni's father opposes her relationship with Vijay, whose social standing is lower than theirs. He arranges Chandni's wedding with Shivraj, who physically abuses her.

programme.title: I Love NY
programme.desc: A beautiful musician Kangana Ranaut and a serious Wall Street banker Sunny Deol. They cross paths on New Year's Eve and share their unique experiences.

programme.title: Ram Setu
programme.desc: An atheist archaeologist turned believer must race against time to prove the true existence of the legendary Ram Setu before evil forces destroy the pillar of India's heritage.

programme.title: De De Pyaar De
programme.desc: A 50-year-old single father faces disapproval from his family and his ex-wife when he falls in love with a 26-year-old woman.

programme.title: Judwaa 2
programme.desc: Raja and Prem, twins separated at birth, join forces as adults to take down a smuggling kingpin, who threatens to destroy their family.

programme.title: Ishaqzaade
programme.desc: Ishaqzaade

programme.title: Agneepath
programme.desc: Vijay's father is killed by the ruthless Kancha Cheena. As he grows up, Vijay seeks revenge and allies with Rauf Lala, a powerful kingpin, to take down Kancha and reclaim justice.

programme.title: Mass Leader
programme.desc: Captain Shivaraj, an honest army officer, and his associates Guru and Viji kill terrorists to protect India. They learn that a corrupt politician is helping illegal immigrants settle in the country.

programme.title: Devata
programme.desc: Mary meets a boy in college, and falls in love with him. He, however, refuses to marry her. When he is mysteriously killed, all fingers point to Tony, Mary's father.

programme.title: Bombay Velvet
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of ambition, love, greed, and jazz - Bombay Velvet is the story of one ordinary man who goes against all odds and forges his destiny to become a 'Big Shot'.

programme.title: Liger Saala Crossbreed
programme.desc: A talented young MMA fighter trains hard to rise up the ranks. However, his goals are hindered when his lover is kidnapped.

programme.title: Mimi
programme.desc: An aspiring actress in a small town agrees to bear a child for a visiting couple seeking a surrogate mother, but her experience takes unexpected turns.

programme.title: The Family Star
programme.desc: Govardhan dreams big but faces tough challenges in his middle-class Indian family, dealing with love, betrayal, and trust as he navigates his path to greatness.

programme.title: Sultan
programme.desc: Sultan Ali Khan, a former wrestler, quits after his son's death. Years later, he returns to the sport, seeking prize money and redemption, determined to reclaim his lost respect.

programme.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin
programme.desc: Savi's new teaching job sparks hope and forms a bond with Saisha.

programme.title: Udne Ki Aasha
programme.desc: Sayali desires a fairytale romance, but fate intertwines her with Sachin, a complex figure. Will her dreams of a perfect life survive this unexpected connection?

programme.title: Pocket Mein Aasmaan
programme.desc: With her 'never-give-up' attitude intact, nothing can stop Rani from becoming a doctor. But an early marriage and pregnancy may cast a shadowonherdreams.

programme.title: Jaadu Teri Nazar Dayan Ka Mausam
programme.desc: Daavansh, holds the secret to a Daayan's immortality. She, a Rewavanshi, is destined to stop him. Bound by fate as enemies, what happens when love defies destiny?

programme.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai
programme.desc: Dr. Abhimanyu's love for Akshara faces a twist with Arohi.

programme.title: Anupamaa
programme.desc: Anupamaa seeks self-worth, reclaiming her life after unnoticed sacrifices.

programme.title: Jhanak
programme.desc: Jhanak's dance dreams shatter after a tragedy, leading to a convenient marriage.

programme.desc: Savi's new teaching job sparks hope and forms a bond with Saisha.

programme.title: Turban Tadka
programme.desc: S6: Chef Harpal Singh Sokhi, the most entertaining and energetic chef takes you on a gastronomic journey in a fun and lively manner, cooking some traditional and rustic delicacies.

programme.title: Sanjeev Kapoors Kitchen
programme.desc: S3: In this Unique show Master Chef Sanjeev Kapoor will teach the nation his top recipes. From main course to starters, it will feature his best signature dishes.

programme.title: Cook Smart
programme.desc: S1: This show will teach you easy and healthy recipes cooked in a smart way. Master Chef Sanjeev Kapoor will help you give up on unhealthy food and make you to fall in love with your kitchen.

programme.title: Mummy Ka Magic S14
programme.desc: S14: Former model Amrita Raichand provides and shares mouth-watering and healthy recipes of various snacks and desserts for children.

programme.title: Mahadev - Gatha Shiv Aur Sati Ki
programme.desc: He is the supreme being and the destroyer of evil. Witness lord Shiva's story, his avatars, and a union that shaped the universe - his marriage to parvati.

programme.desc: The show follows Katha, a strong-willed woman, and UV, a fiery chef. Their clashes turn into unexpected love, fueled by pride, revenge, and redemption in a gripping drama.
